hero.title: Secure and Convenient
hero.description: Kaitu.io provides enterprise-grade network proxy services with multi-platform client support, utilising advanced encryption technology to ensure your network connection is secure, fast and stable.

security.title: Kaitu Protocol - Next Generation Network Transmission Technology
security.description: The Kaitu Protocol is our proprietary next-generation network transmission protocol, employing advanced technologies such as multipath aggregation, military-grade encryption and intelligent routing to provide you with a secure, fast and stable network connection experience.

caTech.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
caTech.description: Kaitu Protocol's innovative multipath aggregation technology utilises multiple network channels simultaneously to transmit data, achieving bandwidth aggregation and intelligent load balancing. Even when a single path fails, seamless failover ensures your connection never drops.

advantages.title: Core Features
advantages.item1: Multi-channel simultaneous transmission with intelligent bandwidth aggregation
advantages.item2: Real-time RTT measurement with automatic optimal path selection
advantages.item4: Exponential moving average algorithm for precise path evaluation

adaptive.title: Enterprise Network Adaptation
adaptive.item1: Intelligent protocol selection based on network conditions
adaptive.item2: Support for WebSocket, HTTP/2 and multiple transport methods
adaptive.item3: Real-time network quality monitoring and optimisation
adaptive.item4: Reliable connection guarantee in weak network environments

multipath.title: Multipath Aggregation
multipath.description: Utilises multiple network channels simultaneously, intelligently selects optimal paths, achieving bandwidth aggregation and automatic failover

encryption.title: Military-Grade Encryption
encryption.description: Employs AES-256-GCM encryption algorithm, ECDSA P-256 elliptic curve, PBKDF2 with 100,000 iterations for key derivation

smartRouting.title: Intelligent Routing
smartRouting.description: Real-time path optimisation based on RTT, exponential moving average algorithm ensures fastest channel is always used

disguise.title: Traffic Camouflage
disguise.description: CA certificate simulation technology presents traffic as standard HTTPS, seamlessly blending into normal network environments

failover.title: Automatic Failover
failover.description: Millisecond-level switching when single path fails, completely transparent to users, ensuring business continuity

performance.title: High-Performance Architecture
performance.description: Supports 5,000 concurrent connections, 32KB buffer pool optimisation, zero-copy data forwarding

kaitu.name: Kaitu
kaitu.tech: MPTCP multipath aggregation + CA certificate camouflage

visualization.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
visualization.subtitle: Live demonstration: Data transmitted simultaneously through multiple relay nodes with intelligent optimal path selection
visualization.description: The diagram above illustrates the Kaitu Protocol's multipath aggregation architecture: data from the client is simultaneously transmitted through multiple geographically distributed relay nodes to the target server. The system monitors the latency (RTT) of each node in real-time, automatically allocating more traffic to the optimal node (green dashed border). When a node fails, traffic instantly switches to other available nodes, ensuring uninterrupted connectivity. Each relay node can also be configured with multiple network interfaces to further aggregate bandwidth.

download.subtitle: Select the client for your device and begin your secure network journey
